Articles.Content:
So, two days ago 2K Games released an alpha version of a new game - Evolve. You can grab it on Curse for free for two days, redeeming the code, buy for 60$ on Steam, or have it already in your Steam library (if you bought XCOM: Enemy Unknown earlier - just like me ^^)

Anyone played it? What are your impressions? And what is more important - anyone want to play it in team? You can find team members here. Probably.
I;m super excited for this game! Can't imagine anyone that isn't.
